channel.title: Need help with adding domain to localhost
channel.description:
well i added datebas (demonik_lsd) to localhost. my problem is that i dont know how to add it to a website so people can get on the register page etc etc.
please help
thx

item.title: Need help with adding domain to localhost
item.dc:creator: @SoundTable SoundTable
item.description:
@SoundTable wrote:

use wamp server
go to www folder
add your server files
go to http://localhost

simple as muffin

item.source: Need help with adding domain to localhost

item.title: Need help with adding domain to localhost
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

First of goto www.no-ip.com, Register an account, and Create a domain.

Then Forward port 80.

Then with the divine source you have, get the www folder an put this in your C:/wamp folder.

Then people can connect to your webpage now.

Also you dont have to create a domain at no-ip.com, just forward port 80 and give people your ip, type that in webbrowser and your webpage will load up for players to register.

Read full topic
